page.title: 15HOVERCRAFT
page.content:
The SRN4 Mk1 started service with Hoverlloyd in1969 from Ramsgate to Calais.The SRN4 Mk1 was built by British Hovercraft Corporation and had the capability of carrying 30 cars and 254 passengers.Whilst in service with Hoverlloyd and Seaspeed,improvements to capacity and reliability followed to produce Mk2 and Mk3 versions.
Hoverspeed was formed in October 1981, through a merger of Hoverlloyd ans Seaspeed, as a progression in operating commercial hovercraft over cross-channel routes. The hovercraft is now firmly established as an alternative to traditional ships, with superior speed,comfort and flexibility.
